settings.heading: Materials
settings.content: Printed on premium magnetic substrate — a flexible yet rigid sheet with a powerful adhesive magnet backing. The print surface uses a high-gloss or matte finish UV coating for vibrant, long-lasting color reproduction. Die-cut to your exact shape using precision cutting machines for clean, sharp edges.

settings.heading: Design Requirements
settings.content:
• Accepted formats: PNG, PDF, AI, PSD, SVG
  • Minimum resolution: 300 DPI at final print size
  • Color mode: CMYK recommended for accurate color output
  • Bleed: Include 3 mm bleed on all edges
  • Safe zone: Keep important content at least 3 mm from the trim line
  • Shape outline: If ordering a custom shape, include a separate cut-line layer

settings.heading: Dimensions
settings.content:
• Small: up to 5 × 8 cm
  • Medium: up to 7 × 11 cm
  • Large: up to 10 × 15 cm
  • Custom size: contact us before ordering for a quote

Thickness: approx. 0.8 mm (magnet layer included).

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Production: 3–5 business days.

Standard shipping: 7–14 business days after dispatch.

Custom-printed items are non-refundable unless the product arrives defective or damaged. Please double-check your artwork before submitting — we print exactly what you provide.

settings.heading: Care Instructions
settings.content:
• Wipe clean with a dry or slightly damp cloth. Avoid soaking in water.
  • Do not expose to extreme heat (e.g., direct sunlight for extended periods) as this may warp the substrate.
  • Keep away from electronic devices sensitive to magnetic fields (e.g., credit cards, hard drives, pacemakers).
  • Suitable for most metal surfaces: fridges, whiteboards, filing cabinets.

settings.text: Ordering a custom magnet bookmark is simple. Follow these four steps and we handle the rest — from printing to delivery.

settings.title: 1. Choose Your Shape
settings.text: Pick from our preset bookmark shapes or go fully custom — upload your own silhouette outline.

settings.title: 2. Upload Your Design
settings.text: Submit your artwork in PNG, PDF, or AI format. Our team reviews it and confirms before printing.

settings.title: 3. We Print & Cut
settings.text: Precision digital printing with vivid CMYK inks, then die-cut to your exact shape with clean edges.

settings.title: 4. Delivered to You
settings.text: Carefully packaged and shipped straight to your door, ready to use or gift.

Accepted formats: PNG, PDF, AI, PSD, SVG

Minimum resolution: 300 DPI at final print size — lower resolution files may result in blurry output.

Color mode: CMYK recommended for the most accurate on-press color reproduction. RGB files are accepted but colors may shift slightly.

Bleed: Include a 3 mm bleed on all edges so the print extends beyond the cut line with no white borders.

Safe zone: Keep all important content (text, logos, key artwork) at least 3 mm from the trim line to avoid being clipped during cutting.

Not sure if your file is ready? Contact us and we'll review it for free before you place your order.

settings.title: Production
settings.text: 3–5 business days for printing, quality check, and die-cutting.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.text: 7–14 business days standard international delivery after dispatch.

settings.title: Total Estimate
settings.text: Approximately 10–20 business days from the moment you place your order.

settings.heading: What file formats do you accept?
settings.row_content: We accept PNG, PDF, AI, PSD, and SVG files. The minimum resolution is 300 DPI at the final print size. Files below this threshold may produce blurry results.

settings.heading: Can I order any shape?
settings.row_content: Yes! You can upload your own shape outline (as a separate cut-line layer in your file) or choose from our preset bookmark shapes during checkout. There is no restriction on complexity.

settings.heading: What is the minimum order quantity?
settings.row_content: The minimum order quantity is 1 piece. There is no bulk requirement, so you can test a single design before scaling up.

settings.heading: How strong is the magnet?
settings.row_content: The magnets use a strong neodymium-grade flexible magnet backing. They will securely hold several sheets of paper on standard metal surfaces such as refrigerators, filing cabinets, and magnetic whiteboards.

settings.heading: Are the magnets safe for children?
settings.row_content: This product contains a small magnet and is not suitable for children under 3 years of age. Keep away from children who may swallow small parts. The magnet is also not recommended near pacemakers or implantable electronic devices.

settings.heading: What is your return policy?
settings.row_content: Because every item is custom-printed to your design, we are unable to accept returns or exchanges unless the product arrives defective or damaged. Please review your artwork carefully before submitting. If there is a production error on our end, we will reprint or refund at no cost to you.
